p:
Whole lung cell suspensions from Trem1
+/+ and Trem1
−/− infected mice at different times were prepared, counted, and stained with appropriate mAbs. Details on methods for flow cytometry analyses and antibodies are described in the Supplementary Methods. Neutrophils were identified by the expression of GR-1 hiCD11b hi and monocytes as GR-1 −CD11b +. To confirm an adequate separation between neutrophils and monocytes, the expression of Ly6C, F4/80 and CD11c was traced in gated GR-1 hiCD11b hi, being Ly6C lo, F4/80 lo, CD11c lo as described before (data not shown [ 21, 22]).
